name: Shift of Ideology
uniques: Can be purchased with [Gold] [in all cities]
Can be purchased for [50] [Faith] [in all cities]

name: National Treasury
uniques: Doubles Gold given to enemy if city is captured
Only available <if [Market] is constructed in all [non-[Puppeted]] cities>
Cost increases by [30] per owned city

name: Harbor
uniques: [+1 Production] from [Water resource] tiles [in this city]

name: Minaa
uniques: [+1 Gold, +2 Production] from [Sea Trade Route (Gold)] tiles [in this city]
[+2 Production] from [Sea Trade Route (Food)] tiles [in this city]
[+2 Production] from [Sea Trade Route (Production)] tiles [in this city]

name: Trade Harbor
uniques: [+1 Gold] from [Sea Trade Route (Gold)] tiles [in this city]
[+1 Production] from [Water resource] tiles [in this city]
[+15]% Production when constructing [Water] units [in this city]

name: Feitoria
uniques: [+1 Gold] from [Sea Trade Route (Gold)] tiles [in this city]
[+1 Gold] from [Water resource] tiles [in this city]
New [Water] units start with [15] XP [in this city]

name: Great Mosque of Djenne
uniques: All newly-trained [Great Prophet] units [in this city] receive the [Devout] promotion
All newly-trained [Missionary] units [in this city] receive the [Devout] promotion
quote: 'With the magnificence of eternity before us, let time, with all its fluctuations, dwindle into its own littleness.' - Thomas Chalmers

name: Hagia Sophia
quote: 'For it soars to a height to match the sky, and as if surging up from among the other buildings it stands on high and looks down upon the remainder of the city, adorning it, because it is a part of it, but glorying in its own beauty' - Procopius, De Aedificis

name: Kingdom Hall
uniques: Only available <in cities without a [Kingdom Hall]>
quote: 'Here starts the rule in which it will lead us to the bright future.' - Colziand King

name: Stronghold
uniques: All newly-trained [relevant] units [in this city] receive the [Blitz] promotion
All newly-trained [relevant] units [in this city] receive the [Logistics] promotion
New [Military] units start with [500] XP [in this city]
Destroyed when the city is captured

name: Monastery
uniques: [+1 Culture, +1 Faith] from [Wine] tiles [in this city]
Doubles Gold given to enemy if city is captured
Can be purchased for [225] [Faith] [in all cities]
Only available <in cities with a [Monasteries] religion>

name: Synagogue

Can be purchased for [200] [Faith] [in all cities]
Only available <in cities with a [Synagogues] religion>
